title: Delete a File
text:
To delete a file, you must import the OS module, and run its
os.remove() function:

title: Check if File exist:
text: To avoid getting an error, you might want to check if the file exists before you try to delete it:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
import osif os.path.exists("demofile.txt"):  os.remove("demofile.txt")
  else:  print("The file does not exist")

title: Delete Folder
text: To delete an entire folder, use the os.rmdir() method:
Note: You can only remove empty folders.
